summary: A young woman gets closely watched by her jealous fiance while she is trying to deliver cakes to customers' houses.
cast: Marisa Allasio|Germán Cobos|Mario Carotenuto|Memmo Carotenuto|Nino Manfredi|Alberto Bonucci|Bice Valori|Gianrico Tedeschi|Sandra Mondaini|Gianni Agus|Paolo Ferrari|Raffaele Pisu|Gianni Bonagura|Alberto Rabagliati|Giacomo Furia|Nuto Navarrini|Anna Campori|Pilar Gómez Ferrer|Pietro Carloni|Fernando Sancho|Adriana Facchetti|Luz Márquez|Fanny Landini|Francesco Mulè|Giulio Calì|Loris Gizzi|Salvo Libassi|Lamberto Antinori|Ángel Aranda|Ettore Manni
title: Susana, pura nata
